description:
At Garber Law, we appreciate that your legal situation can be a cause for serious concern. From our law offices in Philadelphia, we have helped thousands of people navigate issues involving personal injury, workers’ compensation, employment and criminal law. Our goal is to explain the law as it pertains to your case so that you can make an informed decision regarding how to move forward, and to advocate for your best interests every step of the way.

Thinking outside the box, our attorneys use creative tactics to support your case. Although we are adept at reaching a settlement, we approach every case as if it will be resolved in the courtroom. This kind of preparation puts you in the strongest position to pursue justice. The team at our law offices has been helping people throughout South Jersey and Pennsylvania for decades in recovering compensation, securing not guilty verdicts and protecting their rights.

We will help you to feel confident as your case proceeds. Garber Law has earned a reputation for providing aggressive representation and excellent customer service. We accept credit cards, offer free consultations and make ourselves available so your questions and concerns will be answered promptly.
